name: Princess Kidnapper 2 - VR
summary:
The madman is coming back, kidnap the princess, wipe out her army and break her love apart.  
 
This game is a pure archery madness. The player can use multiple weapons to either kill the enemy or change the environment. Implement the best strategy to fight your way through waves of king’s army. If you succeed in defeating the army, the princess will be yours, so fight it!
